org.jscsi.initiator.connection.phase

Class LoginOperationalNegotiationPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jscsi.initiator.connection.phase.LoginOperationalNegotiationPhase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPhase

    public final class LoginOperationalNegotiationPhase
extends Object

    LoginOperationalNegotiationPhase

    This class represents the Login Operational Negotiation Phase of a session. In this phase only further exchange of the parameters are allowed.

    Author:
    Volker Wildi
